snippet: Several of the 12 bombing suspects for whom arrest warrants have been issued are believed to be Turkish.
abstract: Thai police claim suspect in Bangkok shrine bombing that killed 20 people fled to Turkey carrying Chinese passport, though Turkish officials deny it; some think perpetrator's itinerary reveals role of ethnic Uighurs in crime.
lead_paragraph: Several of the 12 bombing suspects for whom arrest warrants have been issued are believed to be Turkish.

headline.main: Thailand: Police Say Bombing Suspect Fled to Turkey, Though Turks Disagree
headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: Police Say Bombing Suspect Fled to Turkey, Though Turks Disagree
